zenmap.desc-tool: Zenmap is a simplification tools to Nmap. Nmap is a tool to scan and search for information on a host. The simple act of retrieving information can give you valuable clues if you wish to conduct a feat (listening port, os version, transport protocol, etc.).

aide.cible: Precise the IP address (192.168.0.1) or target hostname (target.com)
aide.scan-type: Select the scan type wanted within following ones
